meanings.definition: Able to hold much; spacious or roomy.
meanings.sent1: The house was so capaciously designed that it could fit all of our furniture easily.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse was built to be capaciously accommodating for all the boxes.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase was so capaciously packed that it seemed like a magic trick.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was capaciously filled with creative ideas, overflowing with inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The garden was capaciously lush, with plants growing in every available space.

meanings.sent1: The new refrigerator was capaciously able to store all our groceries without any issue.
meanings.sent2: The stadium was capaciously built to hold thousands of cheering fans during the game.
meanings.sent3: The backpack was so capaciously spacious that it could fit all of his school supplies and more.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was capaciously open to forgiveness, allowing her to let go of past grudges.
meanings.sent5: The library was capaciously filled with books, offering a wide selection for every reader.
